regen.absent_element: automatic termination of the visual and audible alert after the emergency call is terminated
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically terminate the visual and audible alert in the cab when the Railway emergency call is terminated.

regen.absent_element: specification for handling multiple simultaneous emergency calls or priority of calls
regen.new_specification: The system shall handle multiple simultaneous Railway emergency calls and prioritize them according to predefined rules.

regen.absent_element: reset or cancellation of the visual and audible alert after the emergency call is terminated
regen.new_specification: The system shall reset the visual and audible alert in the cab upon termination of the Railway emergency call.

label: Once the call is terminated, the continuous visual alarm indication in the cab shall cease.
